document_data.name: Wave Wyvern
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Wave Wyvern''''' was the personal [[galleass]] of Grand Duke [[Farnig Seasilver]] of [[Marsember]].
document_data.Description:
The ship earned its name from its figurehead, a depiction of a shiny, [[silver]]-scaled [[wyvern]] with an open mouth.

As were some large sailing vessels, the ''Wyvern'' was equipped with a number of longboats.

The ship's tiny brig was referred to as "the Stink".
document_data.History:
When the city of Marsember was invaded by the [[Shadovar]], on [[Uktar 2]] of the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, the grand duke prepared his ship to sail to [[Elversult]]. While he planned to bring aboard both his wife and daughter aboard, Grand Duchess [[Elira Seasilver|Elira]] and Lady [[Arietta Seasilver|Arietta]], the younger [[Seasilver]] lady did not make it aboard.

Just after the ship left harbor, the [[Prince of Shade]] killed the Grand Duke, took the ship as his own, and kidnapped Duchess Elira. Lady Arietta hired the [[gnome]] smuggler [[Falrinn Greatorm]], captain of the ''[[Lonely Roamer]]'', to sail after the ship and recover her mother. Under the cover of "gnomish fog" the ''Lonely Roamer'' intercepted the ''Wyvern'', and the senior noblewoman was rescued.

A short time later, the ''Lonely Roamer'' was destroyed by a massive leviathan, the ''Wave Wyvern'' was promised to Captain Greatorm as recompense for his efforts. Greatorm sailed the ship to the city of [[Westgate]], so Duchess Elira could be safely delivered to her family by the [[Marsember Watch|Marsember watchman]] [[Jang]].
